#1 (easiest) Try the automated one:  
[http://www.usboot.org/](http://www.usboot.org/ "External link")  

#2 Verify, check and double check the actual registry modifications you made according to the ngine.de guide, the copy and paste from that site has been reported to fail.  
As clearly written on ***that*** tutorial, the support forum for ***that*** method is this one:  
[http://forums.ngine....ewforum.php?f=4](http://forums.ngine.de/viewforum.php?f=4 "External link")  

There is a set of the files downloadable (without errors) posted on MSFN, which right now is unavailable, once it is back, check this thread:  
[http://www.msfn.org/...howtopic=119963](http://www.msfn.org/board/index.php?showtopic=119963 "External link")  
there is a post in it where **jaclaz** :smile: posted the hopefully "right" set of files.  

#3 Check also this:  
[http://www.911cd.net...o...c=22473\&hl=](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=22473&hl= "External link")  

#4 FORGET about #1 and #2, and try this one:  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=9830](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=9830 "External link")
